overview: Santhosham(transl.â€‰Happiness) is a 1998 Tamil-language drama film directed by newcomer Karthik. The film stars Saravanan and Suvalakshmi, with K. S. Ravikumar, Anand Babu, Prakash Raj, R. Sundarrajan and Thalaivasal Vijay playing supporting roles. The film, produced by Ve. Baabu, had musical score by Deva and was released on 3 April 1998.
title: Santhosham
